title: At the Rooftop: A Weekend Adventure in Sexual Pleasure
description: Spending a weekend at a clothing optional lifestyle resort can only lead to one thing; pleasure. Join in the fun as the term ‘being free’ takes on a whole new meaning. In Hollywood Florida is an adventure called Rooftop Resort Hotel. It is a place of erotic pleasure and fantasy. Join popular erotica author, “J” ,as she shares a story about a weekend of sensuality At The Rooftop.
author: J. .
